articles.title: After nearly 10 months of imprisonment in Russia, Brittney Griner is recuperating at a military medical facility in Texas - CNN
articles.description: Finally back on American soil after nearly 10 months of imprisonment in Russia, WNBA star Brittney Griner is spending time at a medical facility in Texas before she returns to her regular life.
articles.content:
